GP10bhp_11u:595: BhP_11.07.036/3 tat tathā puruṣa-vyāghra nibodha kathayāmi te
GP10bhp_11u:597: BhP_11.07.037/3 tad vidvān na calen mārgād anvaśikṣaṃ kṣiter vratam BhP_11.07.038/1 śaśvat parārtha-sarvehaḥ parārthaikānta-sambhavaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:598: BhP_11.07.038/3 sādhuḥ śikṣeta bhū-bhṛtto naga-śiṣyaḥ parātmatām
GP10bhp_11u:600: BhP_11.07.039/3 jñānaṃ yathā na naśyeta nāvakīryeta vāṅ-manaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:601: BhP_11.07.040/1 viṣayeṣv āviśan yogī nānā-dharmeṣu sarvataḥ
GP10bhp_11u:603: BhP_11.07.041/1 pārthiveṣv iha deheṣu praviṣṭas tad-guṇāśrayaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:604: BhP_11.07.041/3 guṇair na yujyate yogī gandhair vāyur ivātma-dṛk
GP10bhp_11u:607: BhP_11.07.042/3 vyāptyāvyavacchedam asaṅgam ātmano munir nabhastvaṃ vitatasya bhāvayet BhP_11.07.043/1 tejo-'b-anna-mayair bhāvair meghādyair vāyuneritaiḥ
GP10bhp_11u:608: BhP_11.07.043/3 na spṛśyate nabhas tadvat kāla-sṛṣṭair guṇaiḥ pumān BhP_11.07.044/1 svacchaḥ prakṛtitaḥ snigdho mādhuryas tīrtha-bhūr nṛṇām
GP10bhp_11u:609: BhP_11.07.044/3 muniḥ punāty apāṃ mitram īkṣopasparśa-kīrtanaiḥ
GP10bhp_11u:611: BhP_11.07.045/3 sarva-bhakṣyo 'pi yuktātmā nādatte malam agni-vat
GP10bhp_11u:612: BhP_11.07.046/1 kvacic channaḥ kvacit spaṣṭa upāsyaḥ śreya icchatām
GP10bhp_11u:613: BhP_11.07.046/3 bhuṅkte sarvatra dātṛṇāṃ dahan prāg-uttarāśubham
GP10bhp_11u:614: BhP_11.07.047/1 sva-māyayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ sad-asal-lakṣaṇaṃ vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_11u:615: BhP_11.07.047/3 praviṣṭa īyate tat-tat- svarūpo 'gnir ivaidhasi
GP10bhp_11u:616: BhP_11.07.048/1 visargādyāḥ śmaśānāntā bhāvā dehasya nātmanaḥ BhP_11.07.048/3 kalānām iva candrasya kālenāvyakta-vartmanā
GP10bhp_11u:617: BhP_11.07.049/1 kālena hy ogha-vegena bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayau BhP_11.07.049/3 nityāv api na dṛśyete ātmano 'gner yathārciṣām
GP10bhp_11u:618: BhP_11.07.050/1 guṇair guṇān upādatte yathā-kālaṃ vimuñcati
GP10bhp_11u:619: BhP_11.07.050/3 na teṣu yujyate yogī gobhir gā iva go-patiḥ
GP10bhp_11u:620: BhP_11.07.051/1 budhyate sve na bhedena vyakti-stha iva tad-gataḥ
GP10bhp_11u:622: BhP_11.07.052/1 nāti-snehaḥ prasaṅgo vā kartavyaḥ kvāpi kenacit BhP_11.07.052/3 kurvan vindeta santāpaṃ kapota iva dīna-dhīḥ
GP10bhp_11u:624: BhP_11.07.053/3 kapotyā bhāryayā sārdham uvāsa katicit samāḥ
GP10bhp_11u:626: BhP_11.07.054/3 dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭyāṅgam aṅgena buddhiṃ buddhyā babandhatuḥ
GP10bhp_11u:629: BhP_11.07.056/1 yaṃ yaṃ vāñchati sā rājan tarpayanty anukampitā
GP10bhp_11u:630: BhP_11.07.056/3 taṃ taṃ samanayat kāmaṃ kṛcchreṇāpy ajitendriyaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:631: BhP_11.07.057/1 kapotī prathamaṃ garbhaṃ gṛhṇantī kāla āgate
GP10bhp_11u:632: BhP_11.07.057/3 aṇḍāni suṣuve nīḍe sta-patyuḥ sannidhau satī BhP_11.07.058/1 teṣu kāle vyajāyanta racitāvayavā hareḥ BhP_11.07.058/3 śaktibhir durvibhāvyābhiḥ komalāṅga-tanūruhāḥ
GP10bhp_11u:633: BhP_11.07.059/1 prajāḥ pupuṣatuḥ prītau dampatī putra-vatsalau
GP10bhp_11u:634: BhP_11.07.059/3 śṛṇvantau kūjitaṃ tāsāṃ nirvṛtau kala-bhāṣitaiḥ
GP10bhp_11u:635: BhP_11.07.060/1 tāsāṃ patatraiḥ su-sparśaiḥ kūjitair mugdha-ceṣṭitaiḥ
GP10bhp_11u:636: BhP_11.07.060/3 pratyudgamair adīnānāṃ pitarau mudam āpatuḥ BhP_11.07.061/1 snehānubaddha-hṛdayāv anyonyaṃ viṣṇu-māyayā
GP10bhp_11u:637: BhP_11.07.061/3 vimohitau dīna-dhiyau śiśūn pupuṣatuḥ prajāḥ
GP10bhp_11u:638: BhP_11.07.062/1 ekadā jagmatus tāsām annārthaṃ tau kuṭumbinau
GP10bhp_11u:639: BhP_11.07.062/3 paritaḥ kānane tasminn arthinau ceratuś ciram
GP10bhp_11u:640: BhP_11.07.063/1 dṛṣṭvā tān lubdhakaḥ kaścid yadṛcchāto vane-caraḥ
GP10bhp_11u:641: BhP_11.07.063/3 jagṛhe jālam ātatya carataḥ svālayāntike BhP_11.07.064/1 kapotaś ca kapotī ca prajā-poṣe sadotsukau
GP10bhp_11u:642: BhP_11.07.064/3 gatau poṣaṇam ādāya sva-nīḍam upajagmatuḥ
GP10bhp_11u:643: BhP_11.07.065/1 kapotī svātmajān vīkṣya bālakān jāla-samvṛtān
GP10bhp_11u:644: BhP_11.07.065/3 tān abhyadhāvat krośantī krośato bhṛśa-duḥkhitā
GP10bhp_11u:646: BhP_11.07.066/3 svayaṃ cābadhyata śicā baddhān paśyanty apasmṛtiḥ
GP10bhp_11u:647: BhP_11.07.067/1 kapotaḥ svātmajān baddhān ātmano 'py adhikān priyān BhP_11.07.067/3 bhāryāṃ cātma-samāṃ dīno vilalāpāti-duḥkhitaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:648: BhP_11.07.068/1 aho me paśyatāpāyam alpa-puṇyasya durmateḥ
GP10bhp_11u:650: BhP_11.07.069/1 anurūpānukūlā ca yasya me pati-devatā
GP10bhp_11u:651: BhP_11.07.069/3 śūnye gṛhe māṃ santyajya putraiḥ svar yāti sādhubhiḥ BhP_11.07.070/1 so 'haṃ śūnye gṛhe dīno mṛta-dāro mṛta-prajaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:652: BhP_11.07.070/3 jijīviṣe kim arthaṃ vā vidhuro duḥkha-jīvitaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:653: BhP_11.07.071/1 tāṃs tathaivāvṛtān śigbhir mṛtyu-grastān viceṣṭataḥ
GP10bhp_11u:654: BhP_11.07.071/3 svayaṃ ca kṛpaṇaḥ śikṣu paśyann apy abudho 'patat
GP10bhp_11u:655: BhP_11.07.072/1 taṃ labdhvā lubdhakaḥ krūraḥ kapotaṃ gṛha-medhinam
GP10bhp_11u:656: BhP_11.07.072/3 kapotakān kapotīṃ ca siddhārthaḥ prayayau gṛham
GP10bhp_11u:657: BhP_11.07.073/1 evaṃ kuṭumby aśāntātmā dvandvārāmaḥ patatri-vat
GP10bhp_11u:659: BhP_11.07.074/1 yaḥ prāpya mānuṣaṃ lokaṃ mukti-dvāram apāvṛtam
GP10bhp_11u:660: BhP_11.07.074/3 gṛheṣu khaga-vat saktas tam ārūḍha-cyutaṃ viduḥ
GP10bhp_11u:662: BhP_11.08.001/1 sukham aindriyakaṃ rājan svarge naraka eva ca
GP10bhp_11u:663: BhP_11.08.001/3 dehināṃ yad yathā duḥkhaṃ tasmān neccheta tad-budhaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:664: BhP_11.08.002/1 grāsaṃ su-mṛṣṭaṃ virasaṃ mahāntaṃ stokam eva vā BhP_11.08.002/3 yadṛcchayaivāpatitaṃ grased ājagaro 'kriyaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:666: BhP_11.08.003/3 yadi nopanayed grāso mahāhir iva diṣṭa-bhuk
GP10bhp_11u:668: BhP_11.08.004/3 śayāno vīta-nidraś ca nehetendriyavān api
GP10bhp_11u:669: BhP_11.08.005/1 muniḥ prasanna-gambhīro durvigāhyo duratyayaḥ BhP_11.08.005/3 ananta-pāro hy akṣobhyaḥ stimitoda ivārṇavaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:670: BhP_11.08.006/1 samṛddha-kāmo hīno vā nārāyaṇa-paro muniḥ
GP10bhp_11u:671: BhP_11.08.006/3 notsarpeta na śuṣyeta saridbhir iva sāgaraḥ
GP10bhp_11u:672: BhP_11.08.007/1 dṛṣṭvā striyaṃ deva-māyāṃ tad-bhāvair ajitendriyaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:673: BhP_11.08.007/3 pralobhitaḥ pataty andhe tamasy agnau pataṅga-vat
GP10bhp_11u:676: BhP_11.08.008/3 pralobhitātmā hy upabhoga-buddhyā pataṅga-van naśyati
GP10bhp_11u:678: BhP_11.08.009/1 stokaṃ stokaṃ grased grāsaṃ deho varteta yāvatā
GP10bhp_11u:679: BhP_11.08.009/3 gṛhān ahiṃsann ātiṣṭhed vṛttiṃ mādhukarīṃ muniḥ
GP10bhp_11u:680: BhP_11.08.010/1 aṇubhyaś ca mahadbhyaś ca śāstrebhyaḥ kuśalo naraḥ
GP10bhp_11u:681: BhP_11.08.010/3 sarvataḥ sāram ādadyāt puṣpebhya iva ṣaṭpadaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:682: BhP_11.08.011/1 sāyantanaṃ śvastanaṃ vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣitam
GP10bhp_11u:684: BhP_11.08.012/1 sāyantanaṃ śvastanaṃ vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣukaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:685: BhP_11.08.012/3 makṣikā iva saṅgṛhṇan saha tena vinaśyati
GP10bhp_11u:686: BhP_11.08.013/1 padāpi yuvatīṃ bhikṣur na spṛśed dāravīm api
GP10bhp_11u:687: BhP_11.08.013/3 spṛśan karīva badhyeta kariṇyā aṅga-saṅgataḥ
GP10bhp_11u:688: BhP_11.08.014/1 nādhigacchet striyaṃ prājñaḥ karhicin mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:689: BhP_11.08.014/3 balādhikaiḥ sa hanyeta gajair anyair gajo yathā
GP10bhp_11u:690: BhP_11.08.015/1 na deyaṃ nopabhogyaṃ ca lubdhair yad duḥkha-sañcitam
GP10bhp_11u:691: BhP_11.08.015/3 bhuṅkte tad api tac cānyo madhu-hevārthavin madhu
GP10bhp_11u:693: BhP_11.08.016/3 madhu-hevāgrato bhuṅkte yatir vai gṛha-medhinām
GP10bhp_11u:694: BhP_11.08.017/1 grāmya-gītaṃ na śṛṇuyād yatir vana-caraḥ kvacit
GP10bhp_11u:695: BhP_11.08.017/3 śikṣeta hariṇād baddhān mṛgayor gīta-mohitāt
GP10bhp_11u:697: BhP_11.08.018/3 āsāṃ krīḍanako vaśya ṛṣyaśṛṅgo mṛgī-sutaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:699: BhP_11.08.019/3 mṛtyum ṛcchaty asad-buddhir mīnas tu baḍiśair yathā
GP10bhp_11u:700: BhP_11.08.020/1 indriyāṇi jayanty āśu nirāhārā manīṣiṇaḥ BhP_11.08.020/3 varjayitvā tu rasanaṃ tan nirannasya vardhate
GP10bhp_11u:701: BhP_11.08.021/1 tāvaj jitendriyo na syād vijitānyendriyaḥ pumān
GP10bhp_11u:702: BhP_11.08.021/3 na jayed rasanaṃ yāvaj jitaṃ sarvaṃ jite rase BhP_11.08.022/1 piṅgalā nāma veśyāsīd videha-nagare purā
GP10bhp_11u:703: BhP_11.08.022/3 tasyā me śikṣitaṃ kiñcin nibodha nṛpa-nandana
GP10bhp_11u:704: BhP_11.08.023/1 sā svairiṇy ekadā kāntaṃ saṅketa upaneṣyatī
GP10bhp_11u:705: BhP_11.08.023/3 abhūt kāle bahir dvāre bibhratī rūpam uttamam
GP10bhp_11u:706: BhP_11.08.024/1 mārga āgacchato vīkṣya puruṣān puruṣarṣabha BhP_11.08.024/3 tān śulka-dān vittavataḥ kāntān mene 'rtha-kāmukī
GP10bhp_11u:708: BhP_11.08.025/3 apy anyo vittavān ko 'pi mām upaiṣyati bhūri-daḥ
GP10bhp_11u:709: BhP_11.08.026/1 evaṃ durāśayā dhvasta- nidrā dvāry avalambatī
GP10bhp_11u:711: BhP_11.08.027/1 tasyā vittāśayā śuṣyad- vaktrāyā dīna-cetasaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:712: BhP_11.08.027/3 nirvedaḥ paramo jajñe cintā-hetuḥ sukhāvahaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:713: BhP_11.08.028/1 tasyā nirviṇṇa-cittāyā gītaṃ śṛṇu yathā mama
GP10bhp_11u:714: BhP_11.08.028/3 nirveda āśā-pāśānāṃ puruṣasya yathā hy asiḥ
GP10bhp_11u:715: BhP_11.08.029/1 na hy aṅgājāta-nirvedo deha-bandhaṃ jihāsati
GP10bhp_11u:716: BhP_11.08.029/3 yathā vijñāna-rahito manujo mamatāṃ nṛpa
GP10bhp_11u:719: BhP_11.08.030/3 yā kāntād asataḥ kāmaṃ kāmaye yena bāliśā
GP10bhp_11u:720: BhP_11.08.031/1 santaṃ samīpe ramaṇaṃ rati-pradaṃ vitta-pradaṃ nityam imaṃ vihāya
GP10bhp_11u:721: BhP_11.08.031/3 akāma-daṃ duḥkha-bhayādhi-śoka- moha-pradaṃ tuccham ahaṃ bhaje 'jñā
GP10bhp_11u:724: BhP_11.08.032/3 straiṇān narād yārtha-tṛṣo 'nuśocyāt krītena vittaṃ ratim
GP10bhp_11u:728: BhP_11.08.033/3 kṣaran-nava-dvāram agāram etad BhP_11.08.033/4 viṇ-mūtra-pūrṇaṃ mad upaiti
GP10bhp_11u:729: BhP_11.08.034/1 videhānāṃ pure hy asminn aham ekaiva mūḍha-dhīḥ
GP10bhp_11u:730: BhP_11.08.034/3 yānyam icchanty asaty asmād ātma-dāt kāmam acyutāt BhP_11.08.035/1 suhṛt preṣṭhatamo nātha ātmā cāyaṃ śarīriṇām
GP10bhp_11u:731: BhP_11.08.035/3 taṃ vikrīyātmanaivāhaṃ rame 'nena yathā ramā BhP_11.08.036/1 kiyat priyaṃ te vyabhajan kāmā ye kāma-dā narāḥ
GP10bhp_11u:732: BhP_11.08.036/3 ādy-antavanto bhāryāyā devā vā kāla-vidrutāḥ
GP10bhp_11u:733: BhP_11.08.037/1 nūnaṃ me bhagavān prīto viṣṇuḥ kenāpi karmaṇā
GP10bhp_11u:734: BhP_11.08.037/3 nirvedo 'yaṃ durāśāyā yan me jātaḥ sukhāvahaḥ BhP_11.08.038/1 maivaṃ syur manda-bhāgyāyāḥ kleśā nirveda-hetavaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:735: BhP_11.08.038/3 yenānubandhaṃ nirhṛtya puruṣaḥ śamam ṛcchati BhP_11.08.039/1 tenopakṛtam ādāya śirasā grāmya-saṅgatāḥ
GP10bhp_11u:736: BhP_11.08.039/3 tyaktvā durāśāḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi tam adhīśvaram
GP10bhp_11u:737: BhP_11.08.040/1 santuṣṭā śraddadhaty etad yathā-lābhena jīvatī
GP10bhp_11u:738: BhP_11.08.040/3 viharāmy amunaivāham ātmanā ramaṇena vai BhP_11.08.041/1 saṃsāra-kūpe patitaṃ viṣayair muṣitekṣaṇam
GP10bhp_11u:739: BhP_11.08.041/3 grastaṃ kālāhinātmānaṃ ko 'nyas trātum adhīśvaraḥ BhP_11.08.042/1 ātmaiva hy ātmano goptā nirvidyeta yadākhilāt
GP10bhp_11u:740: BhP_11.08.042/3 apramatta idaṃ paśyed grastaṃ kālāhinā jagat
GP10bhp_11u:743: BhP_11.08.043/3 chittvopaśamam āsthāya śayyām upaviveśa sā BhP_11.08.044/1 āśā hi paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham
GP10bhp_11u:744: BhP_11.08.044/3 yathā sañchidya kāntāśāṃ sukhaṃ suṣvāpa piṅgalā
GP10bhp_11u:746: BhP_11.09.001/1 parigraho hi duḥkhāya yad yat priyatamaṃ nṛṇām
GP10bhp_11u:747: BhP_11.09.001/3 anantaṃ sukham āpnoti tad vidvān yas tv akiñcanaḥ BhP_11.09.002/1 sāmiṣaṃ kuraraṃ jaghnur balino 'nye nirāmiṣāḥ
GP10bhp_11u:748: BhP_11.09.002/3 tadāmiṣaṃ parityajya sa sukhaṃ samavindata BhP_11.09.003/1 na me mānāpamānau sto na cintā geha-putriṇām
GP10bhp_11u:750: BhP_11.09.004/1 dvāv eva cintayā muktau paramānanda āplutau
GP10bhp_11u:751: BhP_11.09.004/3 yo vimugdho jaḍo bālo yo guṇebhyaḥ paraṃ gataḥ BhP_11.09.005/1 kvacit kumārī tv ātmānaṃ vṛṇānān gṛham āgatān
GP10bhp_11u:752: BhP_11.09.005/3 svayaṃ tān arhayām āsa kvāpi yāteṣu bandhuṣu
GP10bhp_11u:753: BhP_11.09.006/1 teṣām abhyavahārārthaṃ śālīn rahasi pārthiva BhP_11.09.006/3 avaghnantyāḥ prakoṣṭha-sthāś cakruḥ śaṅkhāḥ svanaṃ mahat
GP10bhp_11u:754: BhP_11.09.007/1 sā taj jugupsitaṃ matvā mahatī vṛīḍitā tataḥ
GP10bhp_11u:755: BhP_11.09.007/3 babhañjaikaikaśaḥ śaṅkhān dvau dvau pāṇyor aśeṣayat
GP10bhp_11u:756: BhP_11.09.008/1 ubhayor apy abhūd ghoṣo hy avaghnantyāḥ sva-śaṅkhayoḥ
GP10bhp_11u:757: BhP_11.09.008/3 tatrāpy ekaṃ nirabhidad ekasmān nābhavad dhvaniḥ
GP10bhp_11u:758: BhP_11.09.009/1 anvaśikṣam imaṃ tasyā upadeśam arindama BhP_11.09.009/3 lokān anucarann etān loka-tattva-vivitsayā
GP10bhp_11u:759: BhP_11.09.010/1 vāse bahūnāṃ kalaho bhaved vārtā dvayor api
GP10bhp_11u:760: BhP_11.09.010/3 eka eva vaset tasmāt kumāryā iva kaṅkaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:761: BhP_11.09.011/1 mana ekatra saṃyuñjyāj jita-śvāso jitāsanaḥ
GP10bhp_11u:762: BhP_11.09.011/3 vairāgyābhyāsa-yogena dhriyamāṇam atandritaḥ BhP_11.09.012/1 yasmin mano labdha-padaṃ yad etac chanaiḥ śanair muñcati karma-reṇūn
GP10bhp_11u:763: BhP_11.09.012/3 sattvena vṛddhena rajas tamaś ca vidhūya nirvāṇam upaity anindhanam
GP10bhp_11u:764: BhP_11.09.013/1 tadaivam ātmany avaruddha-citto na veda kiñcid bahir antaraṃ vā
GP10bhp_11u:765: BhP_11.09.013/3 yatheṣu-kāro nṛpatiṃ vrajantam iṣau gatātmā na dadarśa
